name: SupportLarachelAndJoshua
_source: speak;Joshua;So, is today my lucky day?|Or...|Tails, hm?|Oh, well.|Luck's just not on my side today, I guess.
speak;Larachel;Oh, may I ask what you are doing?
speak;Joshua;Hm?|Oh, I was just checking my luck.|Looks like today is not set to be one of my better ones.
speak;Larachel;That's not good!|Perhaps if you gave up that coin for some good, honest prayer...|I have no need of luck, you see, for I benefit from divine grace!
speak;Joshua;That sounds nice.|I'd love to have a bit of that myself.|All right, let's have a quick bet to see which is better.|We'll test your divine grace against my good old luck.
speak;Larachel;Oh, I could never give in to such a vile sin.|Gambling is a pox, a boil upon the fair skin of mankind.
speak;Joshua;That's going a bit far, don't you think?

speak;Larachel;Gambling corrupts the masses, and I'll have none of it.|Which is the more noble?|To earn your keep or to swindle it?|And besides, this is a battlefield, not a gambling hall.|No, I simply will not indulge in such spiritual pollution here.
speak;Joshua;Oh, you're really making too much of a big deal out of it.|This is just a coin toss.|You can flip a coin just about anywhere.|Let's see...|Well, heads or tails?|What is it?
speak;Larachel;Since you refuse to resist the evils of temptation...|I shall have to teach you a lesson you won't soon forget.|Heads!
speak;Joshua;I knew you'd come around!|Right, so let's see here...|Hey!|It's heads!|You really are lucky!
speak;Larachel;Huh?|I won?|Well, of course I won!|I shouldn't be so surprised.|It was fate.|One as blessed as I could never lose at something so base as gambling.
speak;Joshua;Great, so let's keep going.|How about putting some money down this time?|100 gold coins?
speak;Larachel;That's fine.|Anything I win will, of course, fund only noble causes.
speak;Joshua;That's my girl...|Are you ready?|Heads or tails, what's your call?
speak;Joshua;Do you have a few minutes to spare?|I wanted to win back my money.|You were doing pretty well the other day.|I was overconfident.|But today, I'm feeling lucky.
speak;Larachel;I accept your proposal.|But remember, I think that gambling is an immoral, inexcusable pastime.|You can tell it is wicked, because of how good you feel when you win.
speak;Joshua;Can't disagree with you there.|Last time, I went easy on you because you were an amateur.|Don't think I'm gonna throw away my money like that today.
speak;Larachel;I would never ask you to go easy on me, Joshua.|After all, I have righteousness at my side, and I need no favors.
speak;Joshua;Righteousness?|Is that what you've got?|And to think, you were the one telling me gambling was wrong!
speak;Larachel;Oh, but it is wrong.|I meant to teach you a lesson, and your lesson continues.|When done for a just cause, surely gambling could not possibly be wrong.
speak;Joshua;Now, let's see the color of your money!
speak;Larachel;What do you mean, making such rude noises in front of a lady!?|You're slowing down the game!
speak;Joshua;Hold on, give me a break!|You got me.|I lost.|I've had enough.|It's just like you said.|I shouldn't gamble anymore.
speak;Larachel;Are you quitting on me?|Where's your spirit?
speak;Joshua;...Man.|I just don't get it.|Not at all.|You must really have some sort of divine powers on your side.|I mean, I've been fixing every single game, and I still can't wi-
speak;Larachel;Fixing?|What do you mean?|The game's not broken.|I'm doing fine!
speak;Joshua;Uh...|No, I-|Nothing.|Anyway, I'm all done.|I don't want to play with you anymore.|Go take someone else for a ride.
speak;Larachel;A ride?|Like on a horse?|What are you talking about?
speak;Joshua;Look, what I'm trying to say is...|You don't know anything, and you STILL managed to beat me!
speak;Larachel;What do you mean, I don't know anything?|Oh!|Such disrespect!|What do you know, other than gambling?|Tell me that!
speak;Joshua;Hm?|Let's see...|I know how to survive in a desert, for one thing.
speak;Larachel;I think we're all quite familiar with the hardships of travel by now!|If that's all you've got, don't go around telling me I'M the ignorant one!
speak;Joshua;Aaaah!|Enough already!|Fine!|Fine!|I was wrong!!!|Anyway, the point is that I'm not gambling with you ANYMORE!

speak;Larachel;Oh!|He ran away!|...Why do they always run away?|Who will I play with now?|Oh, I have an idea!|We can build a gambling hall in Rausten!|Yes, I'm brilliant!|I simply must bring this up with Uncle next time I see him!
